price: 35. Daar zullen zij hebben wat zij wensen, en Wij hebben meer.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
